ygData.subject: Re: Recon's Rumble
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, that s enough. There are not guardian angels in this RPG, and, if holograms can do damage and stuff, they count as group chars and are illegal. Besides,

Ok, that's enough. There are not guardian angels in this RPG, and, if 
holograms can do damage and stuff, they count as group chars and are 
illegal. Besides, you need somewhere to broadcast a hologram from.

If this keeps on, I'll just edit the rules and put holograms in there 
so that a potentially useful (if used fairly, without turning it into 
a group character) aspect would be outlawd, as happens when things 
are abused. I'm sure the others don't want to lose this possibility, 
so lets play fair.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Benny Hillo" <teletran13@h...> wrote:
> You got teh wrong guy kevin ramsey, that was his guardian angel and 
an army 
> of holograms, you can't have drones or humans do you dirty work, 
the rules 
> never said ANYTHING about holograms, I checked myself and holograms 
are not 
> mentioned in there.
